title: Scotland
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Scotland par The Lumineers
They all need something to hold on to
They all mean well
Pay your respects to society giving me hell

You could never feel my story
It's all you know
(x2)

May your dreams come to reality
If all else fails
Give up, we needed the company
Let's drink to your health

You could never feel my story
It's all you know
(x2)


I will not fold
She's in control
I will not fold
She's in control of everyone and everything

I will not fold
She's in control
I will not fold
She's in control of everyone and everything
